Row.Text: Lightbingers specialize in earning promotions quickly and can convert other units to the NCR. However, they are weaker than other Atomic Era units, more expensive, and require 5 horse resources.

Thanks to DJPon3 the adventures of LittlePip and her friends are known throughout Equestria. Tales of her courage, optimism, and righteousness have inspired many to "do better" and some have even taken up their own quests to find virtue in the wasteland. Lightbingers are small groups of Ponies, Zebras, Griffens, Hellhounds, and others who have been brought together in friendship to "Fight the good fight," and bring light to a darkened land.

The Lightbringer is the NCRs unique unit, replacing the marine. It has the ability to convert defeated units to the NCR and gains experience quickly. However, it does not have any amphibious promotions and is weaker than other contemporary infantry units. They are take longer to build and require 5 horse resources. The Lightbringer's main stength is its ability to earn promotions quickly, and convert other units. However, due to it's lack of combat strength, it is vulnerable to attack in the time directly after it's creation.
